messages.subject: OT: Bounce House
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! We just purchased a bounce house for the kids and we were so pleased with it that we wanted to pass on the info!  The kids have been bouncing
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone!

We just purchased a bounce house for the kids and we were so pleased
with it that we wanted to pass on the info! The kids have been
bouncing non-stop all day, even the 12 year old is into it! It's
one of those inflatable bounce houses like you see set up in
someones yard for birthday parties, maybe a bit smaller (but still
pretty big), nice construction, lots of fun. We bought it from Home
Shopping Network (HSN.com, listed under Holiday Gifts, Kids). It
was $149, but you can extend the payments out over 4 months ($37/mo)
and free shipping. We were so excited about it we couldn't wait
till Christmas, hehe! Hopefully no more long faces as they pass by
the birthday parties now...they can have a birthday party everyday
in the backyard. Check it out at www.hsn.com.

Peace,
Cyndi
